Articles.Content: Gonna have a lot of fun with this xD
ehh... download links are broken?

ehh... download links are broken?

I've tried it and they seem to be working fine for me.
i can use the prop engines just fine, but the coaxial rotor system and vtol fans don't like my aircraft. Is there a specific way to use them?
Now to rescue Jeb....
Updated the propeller engines, rotorblur issue should now be fixed.
Got any plans to make this mod compatible with Zoxygene/Electrical Energy Plugin?

Pardon me if I sound daft for asking this or if it's already been asked before, but how do you install the crewtank? I'm so used to saying the addons install with the "Parts" and "Plugins" folders already laid out.

Do you HAVE to install Damned Aerospace to install the crewtank?
The crewtank is just a mod part. No plugin dll required.

I've been experiencing a very peculiar bug with your parts pack...more specifically with the rotary engine. When placed, there are two separate propellers, and this continues after the craft is launched. I installed the addon correctly, even reinstalled it. I'm not sure how to fix it, so can anyone help me out? The pack is great otherwise.

PS: The floats are from Tosh's Seaplane Floats pack.
I had the same issue as you with the radial engine.

I had the same issue as you with the radial engine.

Did you find a fix or is it still broken for you?
Space Taco, (awesome nick by the way) that issue was fixed in the latest release. Try updating and report back if you are still having issues.

Version 1.3.5 is the version I used to take those pictures. :/ I've tried removing it from the game, starting the game, closing it, and finally reinstalling the addon but that didn't work. I've even reinstalled mechjeb.
There is a bug with the tilrotor mecanism:if I make the trust of an turbojet engine point to the ground with that part,the part go down(with the motor),it made me crash my motors on the ground.

Great plugin!

There is some adjustement to do,but it's great even if some part don't work.

I'm just about to try a plane with a turboprop at the front and a pusher prop at the rear.
Is anyone else having issues attaching the ducted rotors? I can almost never get them on.

what is the ducted rotor?

If you mean the vtol fan,I didn't have difficulties to attach them.

Anyone else having this problem?

Using KSP 0.16, Damned Aerospace 1.5.3, Crewtank 1.2.

Would like help with this.
Hmm, that looks like I forgot to add "rescaleFactor = 1" to that engine. Try if that works and I'll fix the release if I remember to when I get home.
I hate posting off-questions like this, but does anyone know where to find the landing gear used in the screenshots on the original post?

Hmm, that looks like I forgot to add "rescaleFactor = 1" to that engine. Try if that works and I'll fix the release if I remember to when I get home.

That fixed it. Thanks!

I hate posting off-questions like this, but does anyone know where to find the landing gear used in the screenshots on the original post?

It's the Beta Gear Plugin by C7. It's not textured though, and it's buggy.

Hmm, that looks like I forgot to add "rescaleFactor = 1" to that engine. Try if that works and I'll fix the release if I remember to when I get home.

Where in the cfg do you put that? Maybe it will fix my problem too.

Where in the cfg do you put that? Maybe it will fix my problem too.

I would like to know this too please.
As far as I know the rescale factor can be put anywhere in the cfg, but I put it in asset parameters.
